actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture to study the Shawnee Hills in the State of Illinois for possible designation as a national recreation area.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to study the desirability and feasibility of designating the Shawnee Hills in Illinois as a national recreation area.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture to study the Shawnee Hills in the State of Illinois for possible designation as a national recreation area.
